properties.entry: -- 查询进行中的问卷调查 select q.questionnaire_id, q.begin_time, q.end_time, q.delay_time, q.sample_ratio, q.annual_complete_rate/100 as annual_complete_rate, s.anomalous_months from biz_questionnaire q left join biz_subject s on q.subject_id = s.subject_id and s.deleted = 0 where q.deleted = 0 and q.enabled = 1 and q.begin_time < now() and ifnull(q.delay_time, q.end_time) > DATE_ADD(now(), Interval - 1 day)
-- 抽取需要调查的项目 select * from mid_questionnaire_project t where t.questionnaire_id = ?
-- 查询项目网格 SELECT t.*,g.id as grid_id FROM sati_extraction_project t, main_grid g WHERE t.id = g.projectId AND t.questionnaire_id = ?
